value:
$nMPID_双界ターナ|I may be new to this festival, but I
intend to compete with the best of
them. I'll hold nothing back!

$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Sumo seems easy enough. If I get
pushed, I can just fly away, right?
Wait, that's against the rules?

$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Let's not give up too soon, Tana.
If we want to win, we have to be
sure to show it!

$nMPID_双界ターナ|This outfit's comfortable to move
around in, but it's definitely not
my usual style.

$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Tana is doing her best for her family
and friends. That's why she has my
full support.

I'm Tana. Peony and I are taking part
in the festival of flames over at
$Nf's castle.
$nMPID_神階ピアニー|We earned this victory together!

$nMPID_双界ターナ|Attacking head-on isn't the only way
to win!
$nMPID_双界ターナ|I should have believed in us more...
$nMPID_双界ターナ|I feel ready to learn something new!

This is Tana, and I'm Peony! She and
I are here to give it all we've got at
this festival of flames!

$nMPID_双界ターナ|I have to thank you, Peony. I never
would have made it this far without
your constant support.$k$p$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Oh, I just gave you a nudge here and
there. You're the one who's done all
the hard work!$k$p$nMPID_双界ターナ|My brother thought I'd be hopeless at
sumo, but I wanted to give it my best
effort anyway.$k$pI want to be strong enough to help
people, the way he, Eirika, and
Ephraim do.$k$p$nMPID_神階ピアニー|You already are. Look how far we've
come! Do you think I would have
gotten anywhere without your help?$k$p$nMPID_双界ターナ|You're right. I'm glad you're with me,
Peony. With you around, dreams
really do come true!
$nMPID_二人|Ready?! Boom!
$nMPID_二人|Let's... Combine our strength!
$nMPID_双界ターナ|When it comes to spirit...
$nMPID_神階ピアニー|We're tops!
We lost? No!
You can do it!
I'm rooting for you!

By these hands...
It will be decided!

We're going to win!
Hear, hear!

This outfit is a bit bold.
Seems fine to me.
Ummm...
I will forge ahead.
Let's keep going!

$nMPID_双界ターナ|I'm a little winded! Can we take
a breather?

$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Sure! Hey, Tana, don't you think it's
great that we're holding our own
out here?

$nMPID_双界ターナ|Yes. I'm a little surprised that we
keep winning our matches.

$nMPID_神階ピアニー|I know! At first, I wondered if we
stood a chance of winning. So many
of our opponents are big and strong!

I guess it's true that it takes more
than brawn to win a battle.

$nMPID_双界ターナ|If we strategize and use our skills
effectively, we can even win against
people much bigger than we are.

I'm glad I decided to participate.
Although, my brother was completely
against it.
$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Oh, you have a brother?

$nMPID_双界ターナ|Yes. He's remarkable. And he may be
older than I, but I just wish he didn't
always treat me like a child.

$nMPID_神階ピアニー|I bet he's just worried about you.
That's how older siblings are.

$nMPID_双界ターナ|Oh? Do you have an older brother
or sister?

$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Huh? Well...maybe I do. I don't
remember much about my childhood.

I do remember that I had someone very
close who was kind to me. Wouldn't it
be great if that was my older sister?

$nMPID_双界ターナ|Oh, yes! How lovely. It sounds like
you did have an older sister. One to
take care of you.

That must be why we get along so
well. We're both little sisters! It could
be why we do so well in the ring.
$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Maybe so... Thanks, Tana.

$nMPID_双界ターナ|Come on! Let's show them what
we can do!
